title: Intel NUC 12 Extreme (Dragon Canyon) review: As small as it gets with crazy power
content:
After using Intel’s NUC 12 Extreme, also referred to as Dragon Canyon, for about a month now, I really have to say that I like it a lot more than I thought I would. After all, I normally use a PC that I built myself. I could tell you the finest detail about my tower,

The post Intel NUC 12 Extreme (Dragon Canyon) review: As small as it gets with crazy power appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Intel's NUC 12 Extreme is a DIY mini-computer with room to bring your own RAM, storage, and graphics, and it comes with a Core i9.
